<small>Aramaic form: **<big>[[H8214|שְׁפַל]]</big>**</small>
 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁפֵל‎</span> **verb** ==be or become low, be abased== (Late Hebrew, derived species; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šapâlu***</u></abbr>, derived species and derivatives; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ספל‎</span> noun ***humility*** or ***lowland*** [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>xxix (1875), 604</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be low*** ([[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 48</sup>); Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁפַל‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (derived species)); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Isa.2.11|Isa 2:11]] 2 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשָׁפַלְתְּ‎</span> [[Isa.29.4|Isa 29:4]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּשְׁפַּל‎</span> [[Isa.2.9|Isa 2:9]]; [[Isa.5.15|Isa 5:15]] 3 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּשְׁפַּלְנָה‎</span> [[Isa.5.15|Isa 5:15]], etc.; ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁפַל‎</span> [[Eccl.12.4|Eccl 12:4]]; [[Prov.16.19|Prov 16:19]], see below; — 

**1.** all Isaiah: ***become*** (be brought, laid) ***low***, of trees [[Isa.10.33|Isa 10:33]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גְּדֻעִים‎</span>), mountains [[Isa.40.4|Isa 40:4]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִשָּׂא‎</span>), of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּלנִֿשָּׂא‎</span> [[Isa.2.12|Isa 2:12]] (but read, for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִשְׂגָּב‎</span> [Kohler], or <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גָּבֹהַּ‎</span> [Lag], so [[BDB#Du|Du]] [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Hpt</sup> [[BDB#Di|Di-Kit]] [[BDB#Marti|Marti]]); figurative ***be humiliated***, of man [[Isa.2.9|Isa 2:9]]; [[Isa.5.15|Isa 5:15]], his loftiness [[Isa.2.17|Isa 2:17]], haughty eyes v[[Isa.2.11|Isa 2:11]] (all \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁחַח‎</span>), [[Isa.5.15|Isa 5:15]] of city [[Isa.32.19|Isa 32:19]] as helping verb (= adverb) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵאֶרֶץ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּדַבֵּ֑רִי‎</span> [[Isa.29.4|Isa 29:4]] ***thou shalt speak low out of the ground*** ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:120g»§ 120g</sup>; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעָפָר תִּשַׁח אִמְרָתֵךְ‎</span>). 

**2.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁפַלרֿוּחַ‎</span> [[Prov.16.9|Prov 16:9]] ***to be lowly of spirit***, so [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]] [[BDB#SS|SS]] Toy and others; [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#Rob|Rob]] [[BDB#Ges|Ges]] and others below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁפָל‎</span>. 

**3.** of sound [[Eccl.12.4|Eccl 12:4]]. **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִשְׁפִּיל‎</span> [[Isa.25.12|Isa 25:12]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַשְׁפִּיל‎</span> [[Ps.75.8|Ps 75:8]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַשְׁפִּילֶנָּה יַשְׁפִּילָהּ‎</span> [[Isa.26.5|Isa 26:5]] (but 2nd verb probably doublet), etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine plural (suffix) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשְׁפִּילֵ (הוּׅ‎</span> [[Job.40.11|Job 40:11]]; [[Jer.13.18|Jer 13:18]] ***Infinitive construct*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשְׁפִּילְךָ‎</span> [[Prov.25.7|Prov 25:7]] ([[Ezek.21.31|Ezek 21:31]] read ***absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשְׁפֵּיל‎</span>, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַגְבֵּהַּ‎</span>, so [[BDB#Co|Co]] [[BDB#Krae|Krae]] [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:113bb»§ 113bb</sup> R. 3); ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַשְׁפִּיל‎</span> [[1Sam.2.7|1Sam 2:7]]; [[Ps.147.6|Ps 147:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַשְׁפִּילִי‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:90l»§ 90l</sup>) [[Ps.113.6|Ps 113:6]] — 

**1.** usually figurative, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> subject, ***lay low***, tree [[Ezek.17.24|Ezek 17:24]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִגְבַּהְתִּי‎</span>); city [[Isa.26.5|Isa 26:5]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵשַׁח‎</span>); fortress [[Isa.25.12|Isa 25:12]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵשַׁח‎</span>; [[BDB#Du|Du]] thinks doublet of [[Isa.26.5|Isa 26:5]]); ***humiliate*** pride v[[Isa.26.11|Isa 26:11]]; [[Isa.13.11|Isa 13:11]], compare [[Job.40.11|Job 40:11]] object <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵינַיִם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָמוֺת‎</span> [[Ps.18.28|Ps 18:28]], so read also \|\| [[2Sam.22.28|2Sam 22:28]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַףמְֿרוֺמֵם‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַשׁ‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[1Sam.2.7|1Sam 2:7]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְשָׁעִים‎</span> [[Ps.147.6|Ps 147:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְזֶה יָרִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זֶה יַשׁ‎</span> [[Ps.75.8|Ps 75:8]], compare [[Ezek.21.31|Ezek 21:31]]. 

**2.** hum. subject ***set*** one ***in a lower place*** [[Prov.25.7|Prov 25:7]] subject hum. pride [[Prov.29.23|Prov 29:23]] declar. [[Isa.57.9|Isa 57:9]] ***thou didst shew abasement*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַדשְֿׁאוֺל‎</span>. 

**3.** as helping verb: + verb coordinate, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֵׁ֑בוּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשׁ‎</span> [[Jer.13.18|Jer 13:18]] ***make low, sit down*** = take a low seat ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:120g»§ 120g</sup>); + infinitive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִרְאוֺת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַשׁ‎</span> [[Ps.113.6|Ps 113:6]] ***he who maketh low to look*** upon heaven and earth (i.e. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמַּגְבִּיתִי לָשָׁ֑בֶת‎</span> v[[Ps.113.5|Ps 113:5]] [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:114m»§ 114m</sup>). — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִשְׁפִּילוּ וַתּאֹמֶר גֵּוָה֑‎</span> [[Job.22.29|Job 22:29]] is dubious; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יוֺשִׁעַ‎</span> favours <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֱלוֺהַּ‎</span> as subject, which [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] conjecture For <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתּאֹ‎</span>, read then <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִשְׁפִּיל‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> ***hath abased pride***, so (in part) [[BDB#Du|Du]]; &gt; ***they cast*** (thee) ***down*** ([[BDB#RV|RV]]); ***men are cast down*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִשׁ‎</span> intransitive; [[BDB#AV|AV]], compare [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 121</sup>); (thy ways) ***are brought low*** ([[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Di|Di]]).
